list.query: select pname, cmdline, host, "user" from "process.exec" where host =~ /$machine/

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT derivative((mean("commands_commit")+mean("commands_rollback")), 10s) FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative((mean("commands_commit")+mean("commands_rollback")), 10s) FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("commands_commit"), 10s)+derivative(mean("commands_rollback"), 10s) FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("BusyWorkers")+mean("IdleWorkers")  FROM "apache" WHERE "host" =~ /^$httpd_host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

list.label: 主机名
list.name: server_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "telegraf" WITH KEY = "host"
